title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 4039.21 - Recovery of money distributed
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 4039.21 - Recovery of money distributed

State Regulations

If, by reason of an objection to a horse, a race or
place is awarded to another horse, the money for such race shall be distributed
in accordance with the final placing, and the owner of a horse to which the
race or place is finally awarded can recover the money from those who
wrongfully received it. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
4039.21

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
